newsitem.title: USA: Lady Luck says bridge to reopen August 15.
newsitem.headline: Lady Luck says bridge to reopen August 15.

text.p: Lady Luck Gaming Corp said Tuesday a bridge that connects its Rhythm & Blues and Country casinos in Mississipi to the town of Helena, Ark., will reopen by August 15.

The company said in a statement it has been notified by the Arkansas Department of Transportation that the Helena Bridge, which crosses the Mississippi River, should be open to vehicles by Friday, August 15, 1997. A pedestrian span is expected to be open this weekend.

The bridge is the primary access for Arkansas visitors to the Lady Luck Rhythm & Blues and Country Casinos. It suffered structural damage in an overnight accident July 17 when a barge with a large boom attachment hit the bridge's structure, causing the bridge to be closed for repairs.
While the bridge is closed, access to the casinos will be adversely impacted and, as a result, there may be a material adverse impact on the casino's operations and on the company.
